entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
